name: Akshar Gajjar
company_address: 802, ICONIC SHYAMAL,, Shyamal Cross Roads,, Ahmedabad,, Gujarat, 380015
my_business:
Eternal Ananta by ZADE is a PR, Branding, and Creative Advertising Agency built on the belief that every brand has a soul — its Ananta, its eternal story. We help companies build powerful identities, strong public presence, and meaningful emotional connections through a blend of Strategy, Storytelling, Creativity, and Conscious Communication.
Before becoming an agency, we built our own brand — ZADE — from the ground up. From brand positioning and design direction to influencer collaborations, exhibitions, podcasting, and high-impact campaigns across Goa and Mumbai, we created an ecosystem that most brands outsource. This journey became the foundation for Eternal Ananta.
Today, we specialise in:
Strategic Storytelling, PR & Media Relations, Founder Branding, Creative Campaigns, Influencer Collaborations, Content Production (Photo/Video/Podcast), Brand Positioning, Digital Marketing, Social Media Management, and Full Creative Direction.
Agencies often execute work without alignment — but
top_product: Our top product is a 360° Brand Building & PR Ecosystem that transforms companies into powerful, influential, and emotionally connected brands. It includes: Brand Strategy & Positioning High-Impact PR & Media Coverage Founder Branding & Corporate Image Management Strategic Storytelling & Brand Narrative Development Creative Campaigns & Ad Films Influencer Marketing & Collaboration Strategy Full Creative Production (Photo/Video/Podcast) Social Media Management & Content Direction Digital Advertising (Meta, Google, Performance Marketing) Website & Digital Identity Development Visual Identity & Creative Direction It’s not just a service — it’s a complete creative universe where PR, Branding, Advertising, Storytelling, and Digital Growth work together in perfect alignment. Result: Stronger visibility, deeper emotional connection, increased credibility, and measurable business growth.
ideal_referral: A founder, business owner, or company that wants to elevate their brand through PR, Advertising, Branding, Digital Marketing, Storytelling, Public Image Building, Corporate Communication, Influencer Collaborations, Content Creation, Social Media Strategy, Creative Direction, Brand Positioning, Campaign Development, Media Visibility, Reputation Management, and Marketing Automation. Anyone who wants to transform their business into a recognisable, trusted, and emotionally connected brand.
top_problem_solved: Most agencies execute work just to finish a project — but we create with passion, intention, and creativity. We solve the core problems brands struggle with: Weak or unclear brand identity No emotional storytelling or brand connection Low PR visibility and lack of media presence Inconsistent marketing and scattered communication No influencer strategy or content direction Poor digital presence and low engagement No founder branding or corporate image positioning Campaigns that look good but don’t convert What makes us different is that we work with heart, purpose, and obsession for detail — not for completing a task, but for helping you grow. We dive deep into your brand story, understand your truth, and bring it out through: Strategic Storytelling, PR, Creative Direction, Branding, Advertising, Digital Marketing, Influencer Campaigns, Visual Identity, and High-Impact Content Production. We transform chaos into: Clarity, Consistency, Creativity, Credibility, Visibility, and Long-Term Brand Growth. Our goal is simple: To create the best version of your brand and make the world remember your story
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is the moment I realised the true power of this network. I once received a referral from a member who simply said, “They need someone who understands brand emotion.” When I met the client, they said, “We were told that you don’t just do PR and marketing — you make brands feel alive.” That single line made me realise that in BNI, people don’t just refer work, they refer trust. It showed me how deeply members understand what we stand for, and how beautifully BNI becomes a space where reputation travels faster than any marketing. That one referral turned into long-term business, friendship, and a reminder that the right network helps your story travel farther than you ever imagined.
